Name: Jazzmondius
Description:
After you play an action that deals damage to Jazzmondius, he attacks.
Jazzmondius does not attack during the enemies attack step of each night.
After a card from the encounter deck causes one or more players to discard a card, Jazzmondius heals 1 damage per card discarded.

Name: Blistering Wind
Description:
Jazzmondius attacks X times, where X is half the number of cards in your partner's field, rounded up.
Discard each card on your field.

Name: Shadowjazz
Description:
Before Jazzmondius attacks, this enemy also attacks.
Shadowjazz does not attack during the enemies attack step of each night.

Name: Growing Storm
Description:
When time passes, you discard a card from your hand.
Increase Jazzmondius's strength by 1.

Name: Doom Howler
Description:
You can't play actions from your partners field if you've played a resource from your partners field this turn.
You can't play resources from your partners field if you've played an action from your partners field this turn.

Name: Lifegrasp
Description:
Jazzmondius attacks.
You discard a card.

Name: Doer of Biddings
Description: After this minion attacks, you discard a card.
